SELECT t.time AS 'times', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= t.time ) AS 'addSum', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= t.time AND del_flag = '1') AS 'deleteSum', count(1) AS 'addUserCount', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM( SELECT date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') time2 FROM sys_user WHERE del_flag = '1' ) AS t2 WHERE t2.time2 = t.time ) AS 'leaveUserCount' FROM (SELECT date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') time FROM sys_user WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
) AS t GROUP BY time

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user)-(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user WHERE del_flag = '1') AS 'sum', COUNT(1) AS 'addUserCount', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user WHERE del_flag = '1' ) AS 'leaveUserCount' FROM sys_user

SELECT u.id AS 'userId', u.`name` AS 'userNmae', u.totle_score as 'score', u.gold AS 'gold', u.create_date AS 'createTime', u.mobile AS 'mobile', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM train_offline_subscribe_time) AS 'bespeak', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) >= 11 THEN (SELECT name FROM sys_office WHERE id = SUBSTRING(o.parent_ids FROM 5 FOR 7)) ELSE '' END AS 'oneClass', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) >= 45 THEN (SELECT name FROM sys_office WHERE id = SUBSTRING(o.parent_ids FROM 13 FOR 32)) ELSE '' END AS 'twoClass', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) >= 79 THEN (SELECT name FROM sys_office WHERE id = SUBSTRING(o.parent_ids FROM 46 FOR 32)) ELSE '' END AS 'threeClass', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) >= 111 THEN (SELECT name FROM sys_office WHERE id = SUBSTRING(o.parent_ids FROM 79 FOR 32)) ELSE '' END AS 'foreClass', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) = 111 THEN o.name ELSE '' END AS 'fiveClass', d.label AS 'job', GROUP_CONCAT(c.name) AS 'role' FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office o ON u.office_id = o.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_dict d ON d.`value` = u.user_type AND d.type = 'sys_user_type' LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_role c ON sur.role_id = c.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND u.id = #{userId}
AND u.`name` LIKE '%${userNmae}%'
AND u.mobile = #{mobile}
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY d.label,u.id
